# Ignored Candidates for Housekeeping Audit

## Auto-generated files (should be ignored)
- __pycache__/ directories
- *.pyc files
- *.pyo files
- .pytest_cache/
- .mypy_cache/
- .coverage
- .tox/
- .nox/

## Build artifacts
- build/
- dist/
- *.egg-info/
- src/refactored_duoformer.egg-info/ (stale packaging metadata)

## Runtime artifacts (do not delete, archive if needed)
- runs/ (training runs and experiments)
- logs/ (training logs)
- checkpoints/ (model checkpoints)
- outputs/ (training outputs)
- wandb/ (Weights & Biases logs)
- mlruns/ (MLflow logs)

## IDE and editor files
- .vscode/
- .idea/
- *.swp
- *.swo
- *~

## OS files
- .DS_Store
- Thumbs.db
- .Spotlight-V100
- .Trashes

## Environment files
- .env
- .venv/
- venv/
- ENV/

## Temporary files
- *.tmp
- *.temp
- *.bak
- *.backup

## Documentation build artifacts
- docs/_build/
- site/

## Jupyter artifacts
- .ipynb_checkpoints/
